Name: Idle Simple RPG
About the game: Game characters: There are 12 characters and 12 talent skills in the game. skill: The talent skills can be switched at will, and a team of five people can be matched to take risks. Each character can have up to 16 passive skills. There are more than 30 passive skills to choose from. Each passive skill is suitable for different genres. Players can match any genre they like. Transgenic system: When the character reaches 100, it can be reincarnated. Reincarnation will add a passive skill, up to 16 skills. Reincarnation will also increase the character's attributes and the team's BUFF. Equipment system: This game does not set equipment according to character level. In its place is the rune system. It is not limited by level and can still be used after reincarnation. Combat system: At present, the game has three different combat modes. Ordinary ones are divided into 10 layers according to difficulty. The difficulty increases. Lord, every kill will increase the difficulty. Unknown creature has a lot of life. It takes a long time to kill.
